Platform Overview

Welcome to the NCT e-commerce platform, where we strive to provide the best online environment for sellers to showcase and advertise their products. By registering as a seller on our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

Details

Seller Responsibilities

assignment

Compliance and Accuracy

Sellers must ensure that all items listed for sale comply with applicable laws and regulations. This includes, but is not limited to, ensuring that items are not counterfeit, stolen, or otherwise illegal.

Sellers are responsible for providing accurate and complete information about their products. This includes, but is not limited to, product descriptions, pricing, and availability.

fact_check

Customer Service and Prohibited Items

Sellers are expected to provide prompt and courteous customer service to buyers. This includes responding to inquiries, addressing complaints, and resolving disputes in a timely manner.

Sellers are prohibited from listing items that violate NCT's policies or applicable laws. This includes, but is not limited to, items that are hazardous, illegal, or infringe on intellectual property rights.

Transaction Fees and Charges

monetization_on

Retail Section Fees

Sellers who list items under the retail section or associated categories agree that NCT is entitled to deduct up to 35% of the transaction value based on the item sold. This deduction will be made automatically upon the completion of the sale.

support_agent

Additional Support Fees and Settlement of Funds

If NCT provides any additional chargeable support services to sellers, the fees for these services will be invoiced to the seller before any settlement of funds. Sellers are obligated to pay these invoices in accordance with the terms specified therein.

NCT will settle funds to sellers after deducting the applicable transaction fees and any additional support fees. Settlement will be made in accordance with NCT's payment policies and schedules.

NCT's Role

Intermediary Platform

NCT acts solely as an intermediary platform for advertisement purposes. We do not take ownership of, or responsibility for, any items listed on the platform. All transactions are conducted directly between buyers and sellers.

No Warranty and Limitation of Liability

NCT does not warrant the accuracy, quality, or legality of any items listed by sellers. We do not endorse or guarantee any seller or item, and we are not responsible for any discrepancies or disputes arising from transactions.

To the fullest extent permitted by law, NCT shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from or related to the use of the platform or the services provided. This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses.

Termination

power_settings_new

Termination by Seller

Sellers may terminate their account at any time by providing written notice to NCT. Upon termination, sellers must cease all use of the platform and remove all listings.

cancel

Termination by NCT

NCT reserves the right to terminate or suspend a seller's account at any time, with or without notice, for any reason, including, but not limited to, violation of these terms and conditions, fraudulent activity, or other conduct that NCT deems harmful to the platform or its users.

exit_to_app

Effect of Termination

Upon termination, any outstanding fees or charges owed to NCT by the seller shall become immediately due and payable. NCT will settle any remaining funds to the seller after deducting applicable fees and charges.
